DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine whether participation in a mind-body skills program by war-traumatized adolescents in Gaza will result in improvement of posttraumatic stress symptoms, depression, and levels of aggression compared to a control group.
DOC.brief_title: Mind-Body Skills Groups for the Treatment of War-Related Trauma in Adolescents in Gaza
DOC.criteria: having experienced a political violence or warrelated criterion A stressor meeting the American Psychiatric Association (DSMIVTR) criteria for PTSD according to screening scores on the Child PTSD Symptom Scale former psychosocial or medical treatment for mental health conditions significant cognitive impairment
